name: Polar Extinction
description:
In this game, you play as a polar bear, trying to survive the melting icebergs. Move to other icebergs using the WASD keys. Be sure not to fall in, fall in two times, and it's game over. Survive for 60 seconds.

Use W,A,S,D keys to move.

Press R to reset the game.

Credits:

Trevor Ng - Sound track / Scripting / Planning

Shon Krichevsky - Art work / Planning

Emmett McEvoy - Scripting / Sound effects / Planning
